Name: Dolphin Swim
About the game: Dolphin Swim A simple experience in seeing how long you can last navigating a zig zag path. It's all about FOCUS! Whether you want to be a musician, pro gamer, or even a developer and more! You're going to need a lot of focus! Dolphin Swim aligns your brain's focus with a creative zigzag game! Playing Dolphin Swim every morning can get your brain ready to reach your dreams! Your score is your brain's focus strength for the day. A strength above 100 isn't necessary. Dolphin Swim can even be a stress test for some people. ~Work your way up to a score of 100 everyday!~ Some Focus examples Focus Speed 1: Attentive - 100 focus Focus Speed 2 House Chores 20 - 25 focus Homework 35 - 50 focus Out of Bed 10 - 15 focus Your Dreams 90 - 100 focus Focus Speed 3 Reaction - 3 focus Precision Timing Storage - 6 focus Technique Discovery - 10 focus Events to earn new achievements come and go but return eventually at random. Eventually you can earn all of the achievements! Events may contain challenge mode achievements that are a little harder to earn than others! >>> ~You can play Dolphin Swim with only a keyboard if you like, mouse, or both!~ Mouse Left Click: Everything Keyboard D, S, Spacebar: Swim Enter: Start, Restart Q: Quality Toggle W: Focus Speed E: Sound Mute R: Game Mode T: Trophy (Extended Mode) Y: Event (Extended Mode) M: Music Mute P: Pause (Original Mode) B: Background Animation U: Mirror Effect I: Many Textures O: Background Toggle H: Hide/Show Focus Meter Esc: Close ~Go ahead. Give it a try!~
